price: ለመላእክትም «ለአደም ስገዱ» ባልን ጊዜ (አስታውስ) ፡፡ (ሁሉም) ወዲያውኑ ሰገዱ፤ ኢብሊስ (ዲያብሎስ) ብቻ ሲቀር እምቢ አለ፤ ኮራም ከከሓዲዎቹም ኾነ፡፡
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā wa-is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
